welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Husum! Known for its picturesque harbor and rich history, we invite you to explore our beautiful city and immerse yourself in its unique charm. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal building for Schleswig-jagel Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Schaferhaus Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rendsburg Schachtholm Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rendsburg Schachtholm Airport, handling freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
